com.qtplaf.platform.statistics.patterns

Class TablePatternSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.ai.data.PatternSource
      • com.qtplaf.platform.statistics.patterns.TablePatternSource

  • public class TablePatternSource
extends PatternSource
    Source of patterns from a table (created with a pattern info). The primary key of the persistor must be the index.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
